class_notes: This section is for Post-Graduate students only. Online asynchronous with some synchronous sessions. Face-to-face intensives June 26-29.
course_description: Building on neonatal advanced nursing practice competencies, focus is on collaborative/independent function/decision-making within the healthcare team to provide comprehensive care for neonates and older infants. Emphasis is on critical and chronic care, transitions of care and multiple-patient caseload management.
prerequisites: NRSG 651G or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2311, Section #: 2, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: S. Staebler, Status: Open
